1.5.name: wordpress/announcer
1.5.description:
Announcer is a easy plugin to add attractive announcements, notifications, greetings, events, notes etc with attractive styles and themes. Check out the screenshots and the live demo to see the actual working.

With this plugin,

  • Simple and important Announcements, Welcome notes, Notifications, greetings can be added to the site.
  • Atractive styles, themes, colors can be applied on the announcement box.
  • The announcement box can be positioned anywhere in the page.
  • Expiry date can be added for auto-closing.
  • Announcements can be made with a full fledged WYSIWYG editor.

Live demo

Check out the live working of the plugin from this page. Live Demo

Donate & Support

If you like this plugin, then just make a small
